title: Princess Dress Up
description: Dress Up - Games for Girls is a beauty game where you can dress up 12 princesses in fancy outfits. These gorgeous princesses are waiting for amazing makeovers and new fabulous dress up. Use your fashion sense and your internal fashionista talent to create the best outfit for each princess girl. Choose a hairstyle, dress, gloves, shoes, wings, and other accessories for your princess girls. This game lets young fashionistas develop their taste and fashion designer skills.
